SEARCH
Package Object.Consumables

Class OBJ_Potion_Mana

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
Object.Consumables.OBJ_Potion_Mana
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class OBJ_Potion_Mana extends Entity
Represents a Mana Potion object in the game. This potion can be used to restore mana points (mp) to the entity using it.

  • Field Summary
